problem_statement:
uv init should do git init before getting author information from git
### Summary

When using git to get the author information for `pyproject.toml`, I wondered why it was only getting my name but not my email address.
pull_message:
Initialize Git prior to reading author
## Summary

Closes https://github.com/astral-sh/uv/issues/15372.
setup_command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# Install pytest for running tests and generating JUnit XML report
python -m pip install --upgrade pip
python -m pip install -q pytest

# Install packages that are used by tests across the repository
python -m pip install -q keyring httpx

# Ensure we have any additional common testing dependencies that may be needed by tests in this repo
# (add more as discovered)

cargo fetch --locked
